sentences_tone.text: Schwarzenegger taunts Trump over approval ratingFormer California Gov. Arnold Schwarzenegger continued his very public feud with President Donald Trump on Tuesday, releasing a video taunting the president over his falling approval ratings."The
ratings are in, and you got swamped," Schwarzenegger said.
But what do you expect when you take away after-school programs for children and Meals on Wheels for the poor people?
